description: Generate a transport order strategy set prediction record.
permissions: Admins can create predictions for any transport order. Non-admins can create predictions only for transport orders tied to brokers they are members of.
side_effects: Creates a prediction record and triggers server-side generation by calling an external prediction service.
validation_notes: Flag --transport-order is required. predictions is read-only and generated server-side. Server requires a prediction service URL and token; if missing, creation fails. Generated predictions must be an array of hashes with keys probability and strategy_set_id, each entry must include a strategy_set_id, any provided probability must be numeric, and all strategy_set_id values must exist.
